DOC.brief_summary: This study is a Post-Marketing Surveillance study in Korea to evaluate the safety and efficacy of Relestat Ophthalmic Solution 0.05% in patients with allergic conjunctivitis who are treated with Relestat as standard of care in clinical practice.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Relestat Ophthalmic Solution 0.05% for Allergic Conjunctivitis in Korea
DOC.criteria: Patients with Allergic Conjunctivitis treated with Relestat Ophthalmic Solution in clinical practice.
